Title: Star Wars
Author: George Lucas
Body: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Author: JK Rowling

Title: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince
Author: JK Rowling

Title: Star Wars Episode 2
Author: George Lucas
Body: Have you ever heard the story of Darth Plageious the Wise? I'm not surprised. It's not a story the Jedi would tell you.

Title: Animal Farm
Author: George Orwell
Body: The animals are a representation of communist Russia and the fall of the USSR. The pigs are very evil and greedy, and they kill everyone else. It's sad. :(
